summary.first: The Coding Sensation Development team is looking for passionate, highly talented, self-driven, and proven software engineers to join our team!
summary.second: Are you passionate about creating amazing projects that surprise and delight? Do you have a natural curiosity for learning new technologies? If you answered yes to both questions, the Coding Sensation team wants to hear from you.

responsibilities.one: Demonstrate proficiency in programming, and software engineering.
responsibilities.two: Complete tasks on-schedule by exercising strong judgement and problem-solving skills.
responsibilities.three: Suggest and implement improvements to our development processes.
responsibilities.four: Work collaboratively and communicate ideas clearly within a team.

requirements.one: Strong programming skills, preferably with C++ or Python.
requirements.two: Familiar with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
requirements.three: Excellent grasp of fundamental computer science concepts.
requirements.four: Able to learn and quickly work with new and unfamiliar technologies.
requirements.six: Able to stay focused, prioritize your work, and manage time efficiently.
requirements.eight: Good verbal and written communication skills.
requirements.nine: Able to work independently with minimal supervision.

preferred.two: Familiar with Git, SQL, and NoSQL databases.
